logline: Edward, Harry, and George share a lighthearted moment of mischief and laughter amid the noisy factory setting.
art_style: Realistic with warm tones and dynamic lighting

background.description: Inside a bustling factory with machinery and tools visible, ambient noise implied by visual cues

characters.name: Edward
characters.description: A young factory worker, wearing a cap and work clothes, expressive and playful
characters.prompt: young male factory worker in cap and worn clothes, playful expression

characters.name: Harry
characters.description: Another factory worker, jovial and teasing, mid-20s
characters.prompt: male factory worker with teasing smile, casual work clothes

characters.name: George
characters.description: Mischievous and grinning, ready to prank, wearing work clothes
characters.prompt: male factory worker with sly grin, holding rag dipped in oil

beats.description: Edward and Harry chuckle as George rubs his neck, amused.
Harry pretends innocence, teasing George about expecting a bucket of grease.
George grins and says he'll bring the bucket next time.
George sneaks behind Edward and flicks a rag dipped in oil onto Edward's cap.
Edward freezes momentarily then laughs, accepting the prank.
All three share a conspiratorial laugh as factory noise swells.
